code: import"./BlueArrow.css";import BlueImg from"../img/BlueArrow.svg";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function BlueArrow(props){const url=props.url;function blue_click(){document.getElementById(`${url}`).scrollIntoView({behavior:"smooth"});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"ButtonBlue",onClick:()=>{blue_click();},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"imgBlue",src:BlueImg})});}export default BlueArrow;
